# lodash.isfinite v3.2.0

The [modern build](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/wiki/Build-Differences) of [lodashâ€™s](https://lodash.com/) `_.isFinite` exported as a [Node.js](http://nodejs.org/)/[io.js](https://iojs.org/) module.

## Installation

Using npm:

```bash
$ {sudo -H} npm i -g npm
$ npm i --save lodash.isfinite
```

In Node.js/io.js:

```js
var isFinite = require('lodash.isfinite');
```

See the [documentation](https://lodash.com/docs#isFinite) or [package source](https://github.com/lodash/lodash/blob/3.2.0-npm-packages/lodash.isfinite) for more details.
